scripts.start: concurrently -n BACKEND,FRONTEND -c green,cyan "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev: npm run dev:frontend && npm run dev:backend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.prod: concurrently -n BACKEND,FRONTEND -c green,cyan "npm run prod:backend" "npm run prod:frontend"
